98500.「ボク 風の真珠のチカラで\n ラゼアの風穴の岩扉 開けたプケ！<open_ir:
Puke opened the rock door of Lazea
Wind Cave with the power of Boku Wind
Pearl!<open_irai><bw_break>

98498.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん！\n 岩扉の向こう 早く 行けプッケ！！\n:
<if_woman>Onee-chan! Behind the rock door,
quickly, go, Puke! I want you to
protect my precious flower, Puke!<else>Onii-chan! Behind the rock door,
quickly, go, Puke! I want you to
protect my precious flower, Puke!<endif>

98502.先に ハナに報告した方が よさそうだ。\nハナの所に 戻ろう。:
I'd better report to Hana first. Let's
go back to Hana.
